title: RDP configuration does not allow for "prompt for credentials on client:i:1" to be configured within mRemoteNG
author: Reedazz
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Prompt for credentials on client opposed to within the RDP window, which in certain scenarios does not present authentication prompt and authentication fails.

## Current Behavior
Common RDP setting "Prompt for credentials on client:i:1" does not function when imported into mRemoteNG

## Possible Solution
Enable options to mimic RDP file option "prompt for credentials on client:i:1"

## Context
When traversing via an RDS to a PAM system "prompt for credentials on...
